e52c65af-022b-49e3-8b48-0208d8c310d6.description: Earners of the Empowering Good Badge have completed the Empowering Good Nonprofit Capacity Building Program with training and coaching in 5 key learning areas designed to make their nonprofit organization more sustainable in the post-pandemic environment. The program is offered by The Edyth Bush Institute for Philanthropy and Nonprofit Leadership at the Crummer Graduate School of Business at Rollins College, in partnership with Orange County Government, Florida.
e52c65af-022b-49e3-8b48-0208d8c310d6.name: Empowering Good Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Crummer Graduate School of Business at Rollins College

entity.name: Crummer Graduate School of Business at Rollins College

badge_template_activities.title: The Empowering Good Program is offered every 6 months to eligible Orange County nonprofits. To apply, use the link below.
